articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Erik Knobl
Building good stuff. The team of our awesome @jazza_eth from @developer_dao is shipping!
3RM: Web3 is tired of Telegram.
• It's impossible to keep track of chats
• It's annoying to invite your teammates to new chats
• Sharing info about conversations with your team is all manual work
Until now.
We've built a Telegram CRM, and here's why you'll love it 👇
articles.title: RT Erik Knobl: Building good stuff. The team of our awesome @jazza_eth from @developer_dao is shipping!
